params.instrumentToDrip: Address of the token to be dripped

changeInstrumentBeingDripped(address).return: returns the address of the token that will be Dripped

resetInstrumentDistribution().return: return is Dripping is allowed or not

params.target_: Address to which the amount is to be transferred

changeInstrumentBeingDripped(address).notice: Change the token being dripped to the Target Address

drip().notice: Drips the Tokens to the SIGHDistributionHandler

transferSighTo(address,uint256).notice: Transfers the SIGH Tokens to the Target Address
